tool_description: Computes with International Securities Identification Numbers (ISINs)
name: ISIN Computations
title: ISIN Computations

api_list.name: Extend ISIN with Check Digit
api_list.description: Generates an incomplete ISIN with the check digit.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://isin-computations.p.rapidapi.com/ISINExtendWithCheckDigit"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "isin-computations.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
